mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents, fileAttached) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.boardTitle, b.boardWriter, b.boardPass, b.boardContents, b.boardHits, b.createdAt, IFNULL(c.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount, IFNULL(c.totalCommentLike, 0) AS totalCommentLike FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boardId, COUNT(*) AS commentCount, IFNULL(SUM(likeCount), 0) AS totalCommentLike FROM comment GROUP BY boardId ) c ON b.id = c.boardId ORDER BY b.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) VALUES (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, boardId, originalFileName, storedFileName FROM board_file_table WHERE boardId = #{id}
